scripts.run-ios: EXPO_PUBLIC_WEB_URL=http://$(ipconfig getifaddr en0):3000; yarn nextapp run dev & yarn nativeapp run ios
scripts.run-android: EXPO_PUBLIC_WEB_URL=http://$(ipconfig getifaddr en0):3000; yarn nextapp run dev & yarn nativeapp run android
scripts.run-ios-sim: EXPO_PUBLIC_WEB_URL=http://localhost:3000; yarn nextapp run dev & yarn nativeapp run ios
scripts.start: yarn nextapp run dev & EXPO_PUBLIC_WEB_URL=http://$(ipconfig getifaddr en0):3000 yarn nativeapp start
scripts.startsim: yarn nextapp run dev & EXPO_PUBLIC_WEB_URL=http://localhost:3000 yarn nativeapp start
scripts.lint: yarn nextapp lint; yarn nativeapp lint
